data.title: COpops: Compute CO sizes and fluxes
data.name: COpops
data.description: A Jupyter notebook with a simple class to compute CO sizes and fluxes using the semi-analytical method developed by Zagaria et al. (2023b).

license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License v2.1

evidence: "Here we introduce an alternative method based on modelling semi-analytically the disc CO fluxes. This method is fast, flexible and accurate" (indicates a concrete modeling tool used directly for scientific analysis).
"we discuss how these models can be used to understand better the currently-available data in Lupus and Upper Sco" (shows direct use in producing astrophysical research results).
README describes a specific modeling method without mentioning packaging, registries, or binaries, implying use directly from the source repository.
